title: sylas nerf
body:
Rito?
what on earth is this?
70% less damage to minions??????? I'm sorry but do you not recognize how weak one auto on a minion was before nerfing it this nerf? I tried him after this update and farming is now near impossible. +aoe of q is now smaller, thanks.
why nerf q tho? main poking ability and u nerf it?
biggest issue however is the E shield removal. this is what blew me. wanna nerf his damage and aoe, fine. but you can not take away his shield. I don't get what you mean by grants a shield on enemy or minion hit.

at this point I don't think the champions playable. just dropped from an S or A tier to a C tier.
thank you very much riot.{{champion:517}} {{champion:517}} {{champion:517}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: they want you to get kills over minions lul
